transcript: I've had the fortune of spending 3 or 4 hours one-on-one with Arnold Schwarzenegger he genuinely believes that he can do anything and he was willing to deal with anything along the way and so he got death threats after he was making his first few movies and he just was like I just need to keep doing what I said I was going to do and he uses the frame of Massive Action a ton which is if I worked out for 5 hours every single day I would have to be bigger and stronger than everyone else getting into the exercise science aside it doesn't matter the point is that he would commit to doing more V volum than anyone else was willing to because he figured that if he did at least that it would happen eventually and so you couple Massive Action with delusional optimism in in a long enough time rise and you went
